content:
Here's a sample business model map for a Pinterest-like application:

| Key Partners | Key Activities | Key Resources | Value Proposition | Customer Segments | Channels | Customer Relationships | Revenue Streams |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Content Creators, Influencers, Brands | Platform development and maintenance, marketing and promotion, community management | Technology, data, human resources | A platform to discover and share creative ideas and inspiration | Content Consumers, Influencers | Website, mobile app, social media | Engagement, feedback, support | Advertising, brand partnerships, sponsored content |

A business model map is a visual representation of the key components of a business. In this sample, the business model map includes information about the key partners, activities, resources, value proposition, customer segments, channels, customer relationships, and revenue streams for a Pinterest-like application. The map provides a high-level overview of how the business operates and how it creates and captures value.
